goal.ch: "Computers play an important role in our daily life and in industry. For examples, most of processes in industry are controlled by computers; theoretical computation and molecular simulation are important tools for engineers and scientists for doing research and product development. The main purpose of this course is to introduce C++ as a programming tool for future chemical and material engineers. The course will take a pragmatic approach that incorporates actual engineering and science problems for its applications and examples."

For examples, most of processes in industry are controlled by computers; theoretical computation and molecular simulation are important tools for engineers and scientists for doing research and product development. The course will take a pragmatic approach that incorporates actual engineering and science problems for its applications and examples."

outline.ch: "1. 程式設計基本概念：介紹電腦程式的主要工作，和各種語言的特性簡介。2. 程式架構：資料型態的轉換；變數之設定；運算子之運用; 程式架構的輸入輸出3. 流程控制：If, else, else if, switch, for, do / while的使用4. 函數：利用適當的使用函數可用來簡化程式碼；函式基本架構; 函式中變數的作用範圍5. 指標 (Pointer) ：變數儲存位置；指標資料型別；指標運算法則；陣列、指標與函式之應用 6. 陣列：陣列之宣告與設定；陣列排序與儲存機制；多維矩陣的運算；字元陣列之應用7. 檔案處理：輸入及輸出8. 結構(Structure) ： 結構的定義與變數宣告;結構與函數的綜合應用;共同空間的定義與宣告9. Python 語言入門"
outline.en: "1. Basic Concepts before Programming2. Getting Started in C++3. Assignment, Input, and Output4. Selection5. Repetition6. Functions7. Arrays8. Data Files and File Streams9. Additional Features10. Pointers11. Object-Oriented Programming (Classes)"

ch.competencies: 具備運用數學、科學、工程知識以及現代化工具解決工程領域問題之能力
具備發掘問題、設計規劃、實驗分析、詮釋數據與執行工程專題與專業之能力
具備專業表達、語言、撰寫之能力
具備溝通整合、團隊合作與領導之多元發展之能力
具備產業結構之洞察力，社會責任之認知與永續經營之理念
具備工程倫理與人文素養、強化國際觀，並養成終身學習之動力
